question: Based on the provided evidence, answer the following question: Who was Erik Haag's spouse before 2015?. If the evidence is insufficient to answer the question, return 'INSUFFICIENT_INFORMATION'.

content.source_1:
Title: A Love Story in the Spotlight: The Enduring Bond of Erik and Martina Haag

In the world of Swedish entertainment, few couples have captured the hearts of the nation like Erik Haag and Martina Haag. As a renowned television presenter and a talented actress and author, respectively, their union has been a subject of fascination for many. But beyond the glamour of their professions, lies a love story that has stood the test of time, and one that is deeply rooted in mutual respect, trust, and devotion. Erik Haag, born in 1967, rose to fame as a charismatic television presenter, known for his quick wit and infectious charm. His ability to connect with audiences and bring out the best in his guests made him a household name in Sweden. As his career soared, he met the love of his life, Martina Haag, a talented actress and author who had already made a name for herself in the Swedish entertainment industry. Their chance encounter, which would eventually blossom into a lifelong partnership, took place at a high-profile event in Stockholm. It was the early 2000s, and Erik was hosting a prestigious awards ceremony, while Martina was in attendance as a nominee for her outstanding work in theater. The sparks flew as they locked eyes, and the rest, as they say, is history. As their relationship deepened, the couple's commitment to each other became apparent. They were often spotted at high-society events, holding hands, and beaming with joy. The Swedish media couldn't get enough of the power couple, and their romance was splashed across the headlines. But it wasn't just their glamorous lifestyle that made their relationship special. Behind the scenes, Erik and Martina were building a life together, founded on mutual respect, trust, and a deep understanding of each other's passions and aspirations. They were each other's rock, supporting and encouraging each other through the ups and downs of their careers. One of the most telling signs of their enduring bond was the way they balanced their professional lives. Erik, with his demanding schedule as a television presenter, would often have to work long hours, while Martina would be busy with her acting and writing projects. Yet, they always made time for each other, whether it was a romantic dinner or a quiet evening at home. Their love and commitment to each other were further solidified when they decided to start a family.
content.source_2:
**Erik Haag**

Erik Haag (born 1967) is a Swedish television presenter who has made a name for himself in the entertainment industry with his charismatic on-screen presence and versatility in hosting various programs. Early Life and Career

Haag was born on August 12, 1967, in Stockholm, Sweden. He developed an interest in television presenting at a young age and pursued a degree in journalism from the University of Stockholm. After completing his studies, Haag began his career as a television presenter in the early 1990s, hosting several local programs in Sweden. Rise to Fame

Haag's breakthrough came in 2005 when he started hosting the popular Swedish game show "Quiz Champions." His witty humor and ability to connect with contestants made the show a huge success, and it ran for seven seasons until 2012. During this period, Haag also hosted several other programs, including the Swedish version of "Dancing with the Stars" and the annual "Swedish Music Awards." Personal Life

In October 2028, Haag made headlines when he married American actor Dennis Cole in a private ceremony in Los Angeles, California. The couple had been in a relationship for several years before tying the knot. Cole, who was 28 years Haag's senior, was a veteran actor known for his roles in several television series, including "Felony Squad" and "Beverly Hills, 90210." Haag and Cole's marriage was a significant milestone in the LGBTQ+ community, with many celebrities and fans congratulating the couple on social media. The couple was known for their philanthropic work, particularly in the area of LGBTQ+ rights and cancer research. In December 2033, Haag and Cole announced their amicable separation, citing irreconcilable differences. The couple remained on good terms and continued to support each other's charitable endeavors. **Dennis Cole**

Dennis Cole (July 20, 1940 â€“ November 15, 2009) was an American actor who appeared in numerous television series and films during his four-decade-long career. Early Life and Career

Cole was born in Detroit, Michigan, and began his acting career in the early 1960s. He made his television debut in 1961 with a guest role on the series "The Defenders."
